biotools.summary: integrated Pathway Resources, Analysis and Visualization System: provides a collection of highly-structured manually curated human pathway data, it also integrates biological pathway information from several public databases and provides several tools to manipulate,filter, browse, search, analyze, visualize and compare the integrated pathway resources.

bioschemas.name: iPAVS
bioschemas.summary: integrated Pathway Resources, Analysis and Visualization System: provides a collection of highly-structured manually curated human pathway data, it also integrates biological pathway information from several public databases and provides several tools to manipulate,filter, browse, search, analyze, visualize and compare the integrated pathway resources.
